EmailTemplate.name: Denver Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: vAuto Pricing and Appraisal Workshop - Denver, CO - April 15
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pricing and Appraisal Workshop Denver, CO Wednesday, April 15, 2015
Thank you for registering for the workshop! Your registration is confirmed.
We will see you on Wednesday, April 15, 2015 at:
Location: Denver Marriott South at Park Meadows 10345 Park Meadows Drive Lone Tree, CO 80124 (303) 925-0004
Agenda Overview: 8:00am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 8:30am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Denver Marriott South at Park Meadows, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/denms-denver-marriott-south-at-park-meadows/> or call the hotel directly at (303) 925-0004. We look forward to seeing you there!
